Package pgui.txt

Class Text

java.lang.Object
pgui.type.Element
pgui.txt.Text
public class Text extends Element
An object for displaying text within a Window.

      public Text(String t, float xpos, float ypos, int tsize, Window window)

      xpos - The position of the text in its window
